source_caption_data.pre_caption: The video starts with a wide shot, framing a person in a wingsuit in the top left of the frame from a low angle. A large, reddish-brown rock formation dominates the foreground on the right, set against a sky background. The camera then rotates counter-clockwise while tilting down, transitioning to an extreme wide shot. This movement repositions the person, who has now deployed a parachute, to the center-left of the frame and at the camera's level. The vast canyon now occupies the foreground and middle ground at the bottom and left, with the rock formation remaining on the right.
